sql.query: INSERT INTO email_templates_default (email_key, can_edit, can_disable) VALUES ('PAYMENT_RECEIVED', 1, 0);

INSERT INTO email_templates_default_data (locale, email_key, subject, body, description) VALUES ('en_US', 'PAYMENT_RECEIVED', 'Your payment for {$conferenceName} has been received', '{$registrantName}:
Your payment for {$conferenceName} has been received and recorded in your account.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
{$registrationContactSignature}', 'This email notifies a registered reader that a payment was received. It provides the conference\'s URL alon g with instructions for access.');

INSERT INTO email_templates_default_data (locale, email_key, subject, body, description) VALUES ('eu_ES', 'PAYMENT_RECEIVED', ' Jaso dugu {$conferenceName} kongresurako egin duzun ordainketa', '{$registrantName}:
Jaso dugu {$conferenceName} kongresurako egin duzun ordainketa eta erregistratu dugu zure kontuan.
Galderaren bat baduzu, jar zaitez harremanetan nirekin, mesedez.
{$registrationContactSignature}', 'Mezu honek izena eman duen irakurleari jakinarazten. Kongresuaren URLa eta kongresuan sartzeko argibideak ematen ditu.');

INSERT INTO email_templates_default_data (locale, email_key, subject, body, description) VALUES ('fr_CA', 'PAYMENT_RECEIVED', 'Confirmation de réception de votre paiement pour {$conferenceName}', '{$registrantName}:
Votre paiement pour {$conferenceName} a été reçu et enregistré dans votre compte.
Si vous avez des questions, n\'hésitez pas à me contacter.
{$registrationContactSignature}', 'Ce courriel alerte un lecteur inscrit. Il fournit l\'URL de la conférence avec les instructions d\'accès.');

INSERT INTO email_templates_default_data (locale, email_key, subject, body, description) VALUES ('it_IT', 'PAYMENT_RECEIVED', 'Il tuo pagamento per {$conferenceName} è stato ricevuto', '{$registrantName}:
Il tuo pagamento per {$conferenceName} è stato ricevuto e registrato nel tuo account.
Se avessi qualche domanda, per favore contattaci.
{$registrationContactSignature}', 'Questa email avvisa un lettore registrato. Fornisce l\'URL del convegno insieme alle istruzioni per l\'accesso.');
